FacilityName: Sunoco Partners Mktg. and Terminal LP Kingston, PA

_exec_summary.SummaryText:
The Sunoco Partners Marketing & Terminals, L.P. Kingston Terminal, hereafter referred to as the Facility, is a refined petroleum product storage and distribution facility in Edwardsville, Pennsylvania. The Facility handles and stores various grades of unleaded gasoline, low-sulfur diesel, ethanol, pentane, and various petroleum-based additives.



The Facility has fixed inventories of pentane. Pentane is received by truck and stored in one 60,000-gallon pressurized storage vessel and subsequently injected into regular and premium gasoline lines feeding the site gasoline truck loading rack.



Two requirements of this section specifically apply to operations at the Facility:



1.    Purpose and General Duty Clause - The essence of the general duty clause is that an owner/operator that stores and uses hazardous chemicals in any quantity has a fundamental obligation to ensure a safe operation and to have plans in place in the event of an accident to appropriately manage the situation. Sunoco is committed to ensuring the safe operation of the Facility, as well as all of its other operations, to ensure a safe workplace for employees and a safe location for neighbors in the community. Sunoco has procedures in place to prevent accidents and is committed to emergency preparedness both for the Facility and community-wide and coordinates with the Edwardsville Fire Department and the Luzerne County Emergency Management Agency.

2.    Risk Management Plan - The primary function of the Facility is to act as a flammable liquid storage and distribution facility.  Due to the flammable effects associated with pentane, it is necessary to observe certain safety precautions to prevent unnecessary human exposure, to reduce the threat to employee health, and to minimize the threat and impact to nearby members of the community.  The Facility is strongly committed to employee, public, and environmental safety and health.  Safety at the Facility depends on the manner in which flammable substance
